content.query:
-- Create database if not exists
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.databases WHERE name = 'ExternalDB')
BEGIN
    CREATE DATABASE ExternalDB;
END
GO

USE ExternalDB;
GO

-- Create an external table to extract selected columns from the CSV files
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseDelimitedTextFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT ,
	       FORMAT_OPTIONS (
			 FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
			 STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
			 FIRST_ROW = 2,
			 USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE
			))
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'report_hhz131_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [report_hhz131_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://report@hhz131.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.AgencyCompensation (
	[ID] bigint,
	[Level] nvarchar(4000),
	[ Base Salary ] nvarchar(4000),
	[ Insured Base Salary ] nvarchar(4000),
	[ Basic Performance ] nvarchar(4000),
	[Performance_Pre-owned] nvarchar(4000),
	[Commission_Rate_Pre-owned] nvarchar(4000),
	[ Commission_Pre-owned ] nvarchar(4000),
	[Performance_Rental] nvarchar(4000),
	[Commission_Rate_Rental] nvarchar(4000),
	[ Commission_Rental ] nvarchar(4000),
	[Performance_New] nvarchar(4000),
	[Commission_Rate_New] nvarchar(4000),
	[ Commission_New ] nvarchar(4000),
	[Performance_Other] nvarchar(4000),
	[Commission_Rate_Other] nvarchar(4000),
	[ Commission_Other ] nvarchar(4000),
	[ Business Partner Commission ] nvarchar(4000),
	[ Team Performance ] nvarchar(4000),
	[Management Commission Rate] nvarchar(4000),
	[ Management Commission ] nvarchar(4000),
	[ Total Salary ] nvarchar(4000),
	[ Delayed Payment Balance_Open ] nvarchar(4000),
	[ Delayed Payment ] nvarchar(4000),
	[ Back Payment ] nvarchar(4000),
	[ Net Payment ] nvarchar(4000),
	[ Delayed Payment Balance_Close ] nvarchar(4000),
	[ Other Income ] nvarchar(4000),
	[ Other Deduction ] nvarchar(4000),
	[ 401K ] nvarchar(4000),
	[ Advance Salary Balance_Open ] nvarchar(4000),
	[ Advance ] nvarchar(4000),
	[ Repayment ] nvarchar(4000),
	[ Advance Salary Balance_Close ] nvarchar(4000),
	[ Fixed_Salary ] nvarchar(4000),
	[ Commission ] nvarchar(4000),
	[ Total ] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'agency-compensation/2023-01/01_salary_submission_details_v1.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = [report_hhz131_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat]
	)
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.AgencyCompensation
GO
